sec.div: 2.8. Effect of Different Metal Ions on the Fluorescence Intensity of N-CQDs
sec.p: Ag +, Hg 2+, Cu 2+, Cd 2+, Pb 2+, Co 2+, Zn 2+, Mn 2+ were selected to explore the selectivity of N-CQDs. Metal ions with a concentration of 25 Î¼M were added separately to N-CQDs solutions (pH = 7). Fluorescence was measured after reaction for 2 min. Cadmium selenide (CdSe) quantum dots containing no nitrogen were selected as a reference [ 42].
